name: Peace, Love, & Smileyfaces
description: Pick up Peace, Love, & Smileyfaces in that order.  Use the mouse to aim.  Click the left button to release.  Click the left button again to return to the circle, if needed, but lose 1 point.  Avoid spikey Grumpers, or lose 2 points.  More levels to come, possibly.  A perfect score is possible.
